name: Face Montage Prototype
description:
Created by Xiaodan Zhang & Heming Ruan.

Control

Play: Mouse-clicking 

Restart: press 'r' and '='

Description

This is a playable prototype which encourages the player to engage game-like goals, and also their actions ultimately create some sort of additional images.  The player is effectively making this output - art - unconsciously, or by accident, so to speak.
